plugin.name: QAnyTimeBox
plugin.description: Date time picker control based on Any+Time jQuery plugin.

plugin.name: QSlider
plugin.description: A jQuery-based slider with tick marks that allows the user to pick a value from a pre-defined range.

plugin.name: DialogBoxes
plugin.description: A collection of server-side "modal" dialog boxes: QConfirmationDialog, QTextBoxPromptDialog, QRadioButtonPromptDialog.

example.description: * Pre-built Dialog Boxes: Confirmations and Prompts

plugin.name: QCollapsablePanel
plugin.description: A panel the wraps a header and a body panel, where the body panel can be toggled by clicking a button or the header itself.

plugin.name: QCaptchaTextBox
plugin.description: Render a textbox with Captcha Image to prevent Spam bot to hack a form.

example.description: QCaptchaTextBox: Simple example using QCaptcha Textbox

plugin.name: QGoogleMap
plugin.description: Render a Google Map in a QControl, with many options and multiple addresses.

plugin.name: QTabPanel
plugin.description: A jQuery-based Tabs are generally used to break content into multiple sections that can be swapped to save space, much like an accordion.

plugin.name: QDateRangePicker
plugin.description: Date range picker control based on datrangepicker jQuery plugin.

plugin.name: QAutoCompleteTextBox
plugin.description: Two implementations of auto-complete functionality: matching the user input against a pre-defined list, showing them the matches: server-side (Ajax)and client-side.

plugin.name: QSelect2ListBox
plugin.description: Selector control based on jQuery select2 plugin.

example.description: QSelect2ListBox: QSelect2ListBox: selector control based on select2 JQuery plugin

plugin.name: QFCKEditor
plugin.description: Rich-text, WYSIWYG editor for QCubed - a plugin that bridges QCubed and FCKEditor together. Use it anywhere you would use an HTML text area / multiline QTextBox.

example.description: QCurl: Making server-side HTTP requests using a Curl wrapper
